 @Path(value="{id}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String update(@PathParam(value="id")

                                                                                              java.lang.String metadata)

      • notAllowed

        @POST

public void notAllowed()

      • delete

public java.lang.String delete(@PathParam(value="id")
                                       java.lang.String id)
        Deletes a Place.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the Place to delete
        Returns:
        true if deleted - 404 HTTP error if not found.
